attributes.action: Introduce Penalty Charge Notices (PCN's) for cats sunbathing in parking bays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know how quick parking attendants are to hand out £60 tickets for minor infractions, but what about cats (and dogs for that matter) that get away scott free? think of the revenue generating possibilities?  According to the RSPCA, there are 20 million stray cats and dogs in the UK.  If you fined each one of the furry little thieves just £20, that's £400m less we'd need to  pay!

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
